alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lake County through 215 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Four Corners, or 10 miles west of Bay Lake, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Groveland, Clermont, Lake Louisa and Minneola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
